title: Add an ad to On-chain Ads (content moderation)
description: Someone requested to add an ad to On-chain Ads (content moderation)

descriptions: Select this if you think the ad complies with the required criteria and should be added.
Select this if you think the ad does not comply with the required criteria and should not be added.

question: Does the ad comply with the required criteria?

metadata.tcrDescription: A list of smart contract addresses that hold ads in the form of SVG data returned as base64
